subject: Law
title: Statute of Limitations
description: A fast breakdown of Statute of Limitations for builders.

hook.text: A thief confesses to a robbery from 20 years ago. The police can't charge himâ€”the clock ran out.

buildup.text: Statutes of limitations set a deadline for filing criminal charges after an offense occurs.

discovery.text: The purpose: evidence degrades, memories fade, and people deserve not to live in fear of old accusations forever.

twist.text: Murder has no statute of limitations in most jurisdictions. Some crimes are too serious for time to erase.

climax.text: DNA evidence has reopened the debateâ€”should cold cases get more time as technology improves?

punchline.text: Time limits protect the innocent. They also shield the guilty.
